content: **knitted jumper with saddle shoulders in drops lima drops soft tweed the piece is worked top down sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no li-121 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops lima from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 450-500-550-600-650-750 g colour 9018 sea green or use drops soft tweed from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 350-400-450-500-550-600 g colour 10 denim jeans **knitting gauge** 20 stitches in width and 26 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops double pointed needles size 4 5 mm drops circular needle size 4 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm for stocking stitch drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm for rib needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
